RespTxt: Favor proposal to break up Microsoft
QuestionTxt: As you may know, a federal judge has ruled that Microsoft is a monopoly that has used its dominant position to harm competitors. There are reports that the Justice Department is proposing to break up Microsoft into more than one company as a remedy. Would you favor or oppose a proposal by the Justice Department to break up Microsoft into more than one company?
SubPopulation: Asked of Form A half sample
